phpbb.com fails periodically too.  I'm commenting out the tests for now to make our suite pass, but I hope they can be put back before 1.0.

No simple way to comment these out because they use templates, so suite still failing.
WebRepositoryConnectorTest removed from AllTasksTests suite, please re-add when this is fixed.
*** Bug 166936 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=55159)
disabled url decoding

I disabled url decoding, which probably shouldn't been used for this in first place.
This patch is also takes care of removing extra spaces as per bug 159273
Patch applied and tests now pass.
